rules.text: Do not post real life sexual content.
Do not post illegal content or otherwise advocate for real life illegal action.
Do not repost art that you did not draw yourself or commission.
Do not post either AI generated content or realistic 3DCG renders without the use of proper tags (#AI, #3D, etc). Do not post realistic AI generated content PERIOD.
Do not spam the timeline with a flood of posts in a short period of time. Post as “Unlisted” to avoid this.
To apply for an account at baraag.net, you *must* include link examples of your artwork for approval registration.
⚠️⚠️⚠️ SERIOUSLY, provide link examples of your art or your application will be rejected.
